prompt.label: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: Describe what you want to generate...
prompt.imageTooltip: Describe the image you want to generate. Seedream 4.5 excels at rendering text and typography
prompt.videoTooltip: Describe the video you want to generate
prompt.upscaleTooltip: Optional: enter detail description to guide upscaling
prompt.upscalePlaceholder: Optional: enter detail description to guide upscaling...
prompt.defaultPlaceholder: Describe the scene you want to generate...
prompt.referenceImagesTooltip: Supports JPG, PNG, WebP, max 10MB each. In image-to-image mode, preserves subject, lighting and tone

image.safetyCheckerTooltip: Filters inappropriate content when enabled. Disabling may produce more diverse results, but please follow usage guidelines
image.ratioTooltip: Select aspect ratio for generated images. Seedream 4.5 supports up to 4MP resolution
image.seedTooltip: Using the same seed and parameters produces similar results, useful for iterative design. Range: 0-4294967295

video.firstFrameTooltip: Upload an image as the first frame. Supports JPG, PNG, WebP
video.lastFrameDesc: Upload an image as the last frame. Requires first frame
video.lastFrameTransitionTooltip: Upload an image as the last frame. Video will transition between first and last frame
video.endImageTooltip: Upload an image as the last frame
video.referenceVideoTooltip: Provide a 3-10s reference video URL. Video will reference its motion and style. Use @Video1 in prompt to reference
video.promptOptimizerDesc: Model auto-optimizes your prompt for better results
video.cameraFixedTooltip: Fixed camera position when enabled (tripod effect)
video.cfgScaleDesc: Controls how much the prompt influences the result
video.cfgScaleTooltip: 0: max creative freedom; 0.5: balanced; 2: strictly follow prompt

upscale.title: Magnific HD Upscale
upscale.creativeDesc: AI-enhanced details, ideal for low-res or artistic images
upscale.precisionDesc: Preserves original style, smart resolution boost
upscale.uploadImageDesc: Drag & drop or click to upload
upscale.uploadNote: Image is uploaded to cloud for processing. Larger files may take longer
upscale.pixelLimit: Output must not exceed 100 million pixels (100MP)
upscale.overLimit: Output {{mp}}M pixels, exceeds 100MP limit. Please reduce scale factor
upscale.creativityDesc: Controls AI detail level. Negative = conservative, positive = creative
upscale.hdrDesc: Enhances dynamic range and detail layers
upscale.resemblanceDesc: Controls similarity to original. Positive = closer to original
upscale.fractalityDesc: Controls prompt strength and per-pixel detail complexity
upscale.smartGrainDesc: Preserves natural texture and film grain, 0-100

wan.title: Wan Settings
wan.promptExpansionDesc: AI auto-expands short prompts into detailed descriptions
wan.shotTypeTooltip: Single Shot: continuous single shot; Multi Shot: multi-shot sequence with scene transitions (requires Prompt Expansion)
wan.multiShotRequiresExpansion: Multi-shot mode requires Prompt Expansion enabled
wan.seedTooltip: Using the same seed and parameters produces similar results. -1 or empty for random

pixverse.title: PixVerse Settings
pixverse.i2vDesc: Generate video from first frame (must upload first frame)
pixverse.transitionDesc: Transition from first to last frame (must upload both)
pixverse.durationTooltip: 8s video costs double credits, 1080p only supports 5s
pixverse.styleTooltip: Select video art style, leave empty for original style
pixverse.lastFrameTooltip: Upload an image as the last frame. Video will transition between first and last frame
pixverse.negativeTooltip: Describe elements you don't want in the video
pixverse.seedTooltip: Using the same seed and parameters produces similar results

ltx.title: LTX Settings
ltx.audioTooltip: Generates synchronized audio based on video content
ltx.seedTooltip: Using the same seed and parameters produces similar results

runway.title: Runway Settings
runway.seedTooltip: Using the same seed and parameters produces similar results (image-to-video only)

kling.title: Kling Settings
kling.elementsDesc: Upload reference images for character/object consistency
kling.elementsTooltip: Add reference images for character/object consistency. Use @Element1, @Element2 in prompt to reference
kling.multiPromptDesc: Set independent prompt and duration for each shot
kling.multiPromptTooltipPro: Set independent prompt and duration per shot, max 6 shots, total max 15s
kling.multiPromptTooltip: Set independent prompt per shot, max 6 shots
kling.ratioTooltip: Omni model supports auto-matching input image aspect ratio
kling.audioTooltip: Generates synchronized audio based on video content
kling.shotTypeTooltip: Custom: manual shot control; Intelligent: AI auto-generates shots
kling.cfgScaleTooltip: 0: max creative freedom; 0.5: balanced; 2: strictly follow prompt
kling.negativeTooltip: Describe elements you don't want in the video
kling.endImageTooltip: Upload an image as the last frame
kling.referenceVideoTooltip: Provide a 3-10s reference video URL. Use @Video1 in prompt to reference
kling.seedTooltip: Using the same seed and parameters produces similar results
